resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105798</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105798</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206797</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Allegheny Portage Railroad: Developing Transportation Technology</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Allegheny Portage Eisenbahn: Sich 
Entwickelnde Transport-Technologie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chemin de fer d'Allegheny Portage : 
Technologie Se développante de Transport</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estrada de ferro De Allegheny Portage: 
Tecnologia Tornando-se Do Transporte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ferrovia Di Allegheny Portage: Tecnologia Di
Sviluppo Del Trasporto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σιδηρόδρομος Portage Allegheny: Ανάπτυξη της
τεχνολογίας μεταφορών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ferrocarril De Allegheny Portage: 
Tecnología Del Transporte Que se convierte</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">shows the innovative transportation system used in the 1820s-1840s to tow railroad cars up and down the steep slopes of the Allegheny Mountains.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">zeigt das erfinderische Transportsystem, das im 
1820s-1840s benutzt wird, um Eisenbahnautos auf und ab die steilen 
Steigungen der Allegheny Berge zu schleppen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">montre le système innovateur de transport 
employé dans le 1820s-1840s pour remorquer des voitures de chemin de 
fer à travers les pentes raides des montagnes d'Allegheny.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mostra o sistema inovativo do transporte usado no 
1820s-1840s rebocar acima carros da estrada de ferro e tragar as 
inclinações íngremes das montanhas de Allegheny.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">mostra il sistema innovatore del trasporto usato 
nel 1820s-1840s per rimorchiare gli automobili della ferrovia su e 
giù i pendii ripidi delle montagne di Allegheny.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εμφανίζει καινοτόμο σύστημα μεταφορών που 
χρησιμοποιείται στο 1820s-1840s στα αυτοκίνητα σιδηροδρόμου 
ρυμούλκησης πάνω-κάτω τις απότομες κλίσεις των βουνών 
Allegheny.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">muestra el sistema innovador del transporte usado 
en el 1820s-1840s para remolcar los coches del ferrocarril arriba y 
abajo de las cuestas escarpadas de las montañas de Allegheny.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206797</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105798</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/allegheny-portage-railroad-developing-transportation-technology</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
